scripts.install: npm install concurrently -D && npm run install:front && npm run install:back
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd front && npm run dev" "cd back && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run build:back
scripts.clean: rm -rf back/dist front/dist node_modules back/node_modules front/node_modules back/package-lock.json front/package-lock.json package-lock.json
